column1: '''David Harvey''' (b. [[1946]]) is a New Zealander judge who won the 1980 [[wikipedia:Television New Zealand
column2: TVNZ]] Mastermind Quiz contest with ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' as his specialist subject. He went on to win the International Mastermind competition with the same subject in 1981.<ref>{{webcite
column11: articlename=One ring to rule them all

column2: The Song of Middle-earth: J.R.R. Tolkien's Themes, Symbols and Myth]]''
